about_the_game:
Main Features

Exclusive Items

  • Access to 37 unlockable lines through PASE progression.

  • 6 lines automatically unlocked upon activating PASE.

  • Exclusive skin to customize your player.

  • 4 unique kite tails designed exclusively for PASE users.

Bonuses and Accelerated Progression

  • Double experience to level up faster.

  • Increased diamond inventory limit up to 199,999.

  • Increased bot limit to 26 in single-player mode.

  • Reduced line market cooldown to 4 minutes.

Exclusive Map

  • Access to the VIP Zone, located at the back of the map.

  • Use of the Lucky Machine to play with gold and earn additional rewards.

Enhanced Multiplayer

  • Participation in the World Ranking.

  • PASE nickname with a special icon and highlighted chat in red text.

  • Expanded sale limit in the line market, up to 3,000 diamonds per line (compared to the standard 400 diamonds).

With the PASE Membership, make every match a unique experience, elevate your gameplay, and showcase your true skills!

short_description: PASE Membership – Maximum Exclusivity Unlock 43 exclusive lines, unique items, x2 experience, increased limits, and VIP access. Customize your player, progress faster, and dominate the World Ranking. Take your game to the next level with PASE!
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
